meanings.definition: The dispersion of any people from their original homeland.
meanings.sent1: Many diasporas have formed over the years due to various reasons.
meanings.sent2: The Jewish diasporas have communities in different parts of the world.
meanings.sent3: The diasporas of penguins would be quite a sight to see!
meanings.sent4: The diasporas of stars across the night sky create a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The concept of diasporas helps us understand global migration better.

meanings.definition: A group of people living outside their native country.
meanings.sent1: The Indian diasporas celebrate their culture in various countries.
meanings.sent2: The Chinese diasporas have contributed to the diversity of many nations.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a world where diasporas could communicate telepathically!
meanings.sent4: The diasporas of thoughts in his mind were like a crowded marketplace.
meanings.sent5: The diasporas of butterflies fluttering in the garden were a mesmerizing sight.
